lyrics.text:
Hiva ki he ‘Eiki Lahi,
Ko Sihova ia;
Hiva, pea fakafeta’i,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.

Ke tau fakaongo lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua;
‘I he’ene angalelei,
Kia kitautolu.

Pea kuo ne toloi,
Hotau ngaahi ‘aho;
Pea kuo tau lava’i,
‘A e ta’u fo’ou.

Pea kuo tau kātoa,
Ki hotu ‘Otua,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko homau hūfanga.

’Oku ngali ke mau hoko.
‘Eiki ‘i ho ‘ao,
‘I he ngaahi hiva fo’ou,
Mo e fuakava.

Ke ke ma’u ‘akimautolu,
‘I he ta’u fo’ou ni,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko homau Huhu’i.

Ke mau tupu ‘i he tui,
Pea mo e ‘ofa,
Pea mau mā’oni’oni,
‘I he ‘Afiona.
